attrs.name: data
attrs.desc: Data consists of indicators and dimensions. Dimension refers to data attributes, and indicator refers to quantitative measurement standards.

attrs.name: settings
attrs.desc: Configuration item. For details about the attributes of each chart, see the chart details page.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Set the width of the chart container.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is auto.

attrs.name: height
attrs.desc: Set the height of the chart container.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 400px.

attrs.name: tooltip-visible
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: legend-visible
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: theme-name
attrs.desc: User-defined theme name. If theme-name is set, the theme is invalid.

attrs.name: judge-width
attrs.desc: Do you want to process the width issue when generating charts?
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: width-change-delay
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 300.

attrs.name: resizeable
attrs.desc: Whether to process the window resize event
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: cancel-resize-check
attrs.desc: Whether to disable container detection during resize
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: resize-delay
attrs.desc: Delay of the window resize event callback
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 200.

attrs.name: change-delay
attrs.desc: Delay for triggering chart redrawing callback after attribute modification
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: set-option-opts
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: not-set-unchange
attrs.desc: The setOption attribute does not change.
